urls.title: 3G Pitches: Is the UK sleepwalking into a public health crisis? - Fully Charged Show
urls.description: Almost three years ago I was enjoying my retirement, making lots of happy memories with my grandchildren. Then I found out that our council wanted to build a 3G rubber crumb football pitch right next door to their primary school. This triggered something that I’ d read earlier about a young goalkeeper getting cancer after playing on these pitches. I had to find out more. This was of concern to me personally as my family and friends enjoy playing and coaching football, as well as for the 630 pupils who
